text.div:
Tuberculosis (Mammalian Tuberculin Skin Test)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    1647-7 Tuberculosis reaction wheal [Diameter] --3 days post 25 TU intradermal
    1648-5 Tuberculosis reaction wheal [Diameter] --3 days post 5 TU intradermal
    23537-4 Tuberculosis reaction wheal [Diameter] --2 days post dose mammalian tuberculin intradermal
    23539-0 Tuberculosis reaction wheal [Diameter] --3 days post dose mammalian tuberculin intradermal
    32561-3 Tuberculosis reaction wheal [Diameter] --1 day post dose mammalian tuberculin intradermal
    43419-1 Tuberculosis reaction wheal [Diameter] --3 days post 1 TU intradermal
